textBeforeTable: Track Listing Huge, chorusing washes of reverb-y guitar chords, keyboards and thick processing, the bass gliding up and in with new harmonic roots, and rhythms to sway to. Gleaming, iridescent rallies of altered consciousness is where it is. Nostalgic too, alongside hopeful optimism within the structure of this big sound. Go get it!! Rick Frystak, Hollywood 07/01/2013 Amoeba Review CD Also available in: SHIPS FREE in U.S. $22.98 Currently Unavailable Robin Guthrie Fortune (LP) Tweet Fortune (LP) Home Robin Guthrie Fortune (CD) Robin Guthrie Fortune (LP)
